rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: (Blueprint POS) inform the new request has been created

rules.name: myRule_11
rules.label: inform the new request has been created. (POS)

rules.name: myRule_13
rules.label: Inform the new request has been created. (SHO)

rules.name: myRule_15
rules.label: Inform the requested sample has been tentatively confirmed, delivered or rejected

rules.name: myRule_17
rules.label: Inform the requested sample has been tentatively confirmed, delivered or rejected(Ub office Americas)

rules.name: myRule_19
rules.label: (Blueprint) inform Sample Owner, Requestor, Support

rules.name: myRule_3
rules.label: (Blueprint SHO) inform the new request has been created

rules.name: myRule_21
rules.label: (Blueprint) inform Sample Owner, Requestor, Support (without Americas)

rules.name: myRule_23
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2) AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND 9 AND 10 AND 11 AND 12
rules.label: Inform the request has been confirmed or partially delivered (APAC, EMEA)

rules.name: myRule_25
rules.label: Inform the request has been confirmed or partially delivered (Americas, to be handled by Americas)

rules.name: myRule_27
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2) AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND 9 AND 10
rules.label: inform the request has been confirmed or partially delivered (Americas)

rules.name: myRule_29
rules.label: inform the request needs AE review (CEL)

rules.name: myRule_31
rules.label: Inform the request needs AE review (GNSS)

rules.name: myRule_33
rules.label: Inform the request needs AE review (SHO)

rules.name: myRule_35
rules.label: New recording (Americas)

rules.name: myRule_37
rules.label: Embargo countries

rules.name: myRule_40
rules.label: Update Ub office support email

rules.name: myRule_5
rules.label: Confirmation alert for APAC exc. JP, TW

rules.name: myRule_7
rules.label: Sample: Confirmation alert for JP, TW

rules.name: myRule_9
rules.label: inform the new request has been created. (CEL)

rules.name: myRule_23_pmetnullrule
rules.label: Previously Met - Null

rules.name: myRule_23_pmetrule
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2) AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND 9 AND 10 AND 11 AND 12
rules.label: Previously Met - Prev

rules.name: myRule_27_pmetnullrule
rules.label: Previously Met - Null

rules.name: myRule_27_pmetrule
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2) AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND 9 AND 10
rules.label: Previously Met - Prev

Flow.description: This Process moved to SubFlow = Samples: Email Alerts

value.stringValue:
AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Sample_Usage__c), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Product_Family__c), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Product_Center__c), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Request_Status__c)
), ISPICKVAL( [Samples__c].Request_Status__c, 'New') , NOT(ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].Sample_Usage__c, 'Samples in production (IP, MP)')), [Samples__c].RecordType.Name = 'Sample request', [Samples__c].Product_Family__c = 'Blueprint', [Samples__c].Product_Center__c <> 'Short Range' )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression:
AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Sample_Usage__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Product_Family__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Product_Center__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c})
), ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'New') , NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Sample_Usage__c}, 'Samples in production (IP, MP)')), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = 'Sample request', {!myVariable_current.Product_Family__c} = 'Blueprint', {!myVariable_current.Product_Center__c} <> 'Short Range' )

value.stringValue:
AND(
OR( ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].Request_Status__c, 'New'), ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].Request_Status__c, 'PM review pending') ), NOT(ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].Sample_Usage__c , 'Samples in production (IP, MP)')), [Samples__c].RecordType.Name ='Sample request', NOT([Samples__c].Product_Family__c = 'Blueprint'), NOT([Samples__c].Product_Center__c = 'Cellular'), NOT([Samples__c].Product_Center__c = 'Short Range'),
OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Sample_Usage__c), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Product_Family__c), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Product_Center__c), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Request_Status__c)
) )

formulas.expression:
AND(
OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'New'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'PM review pending') ), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Sample_Usage__c} , 'Samples in production (IP, MP)')), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} ='Sample request', NOT({!myVariable_current.Product_Family__c} = 'Blueprint'), NOT({!myVariable_current.Product_Center__c} = 'Cellular'), NOT({!myVariable_current.Product_Center__c} = 'Short Range'),
OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Sample_Usage__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Product_Family__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Product_Center__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c})
) )

) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_13
formulas.expression:
AND(
OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'New'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'PM review pending') ), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Sample_Usage__c} , 'Samples in production (IP, MP)')), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} ='Sample request', NOT({!myVariable_current.Product_Family__c} = 'Blueprint'), {!myVariable_current.Product_Center__c} = 'Short Range',
OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Sample_Usage__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Product_Family__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Product_Center__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c})
) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_15

value.stringValue: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].Request_Status__c, 'Clarification required'), ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].Request_Status__c, 'Rejected'), ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].Request_Status__c, 'Shipped'), ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].Request_Status__c, 'Tentatively confirmed'), [Samples__c].RecordType.Name = 'Sample request' ), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Request_Status__c), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].RecordType.Name) ) , ([Samples__c].uB_Office__c )='Americas', ([Samples__c].uB_Office__c )='Japan', ([Samples__c].uB_Office__c )='Taiwan' )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_17
formulas.expression: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'Clarification required'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'Rejected'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'Shipped'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'Tentatively confirmed'), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = 'Sample request' ), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name}) ) , ({!myVariable_current.uB_Office__c} )='Americas', ({!myVariable_current.uB_Office__c} )='Japan', ({!myVariable_current.uB_Office__c} )='Taiwan' )

value.stringValue:
AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Product_Family__c), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Request_Status__c)
), OR( ISPICKVAL( [Samples__c].Request_Status__c, 'Confirmed') , ISPICKVAL( [Samples__c].Request_Status__c, 'Partially shipped') ), [Samples__c].Product_Family__c = 'Blueprint', NOT(([Samples__c].uB_Office__c )='Americas'), NOT(([Samples__c].uB_Office__c )='Japan'), NOT(([Samples__c].uB_Office__c )='Taiwan') )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_19
formulas.expression:
AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Product_Family__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c})
), OR( ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'Confirmed') , ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'Partially shipped') ), {!myVariable_current.Product_Family__c} = 'Blueprint', NOT(({!myVariable_current.uB_Office__c} )='Americas'), NOT(({!myVariable_current.uB_Office__c} )='Japan'), NOT(({!myVariable_current.uB_Office__c} )='Taiwan') )

value.stringValue:
AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Product_Family__c), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Request_Status__c)
), OR( ISPICKVAL( [Samples__c].Request_Status__c, 'Confirmed') , ISPICKVAL( [Samples__c].Request_Status__c, 'Partially shipped') ), [Samples__c].Product_Family__c = 'Blueprint', OR( ([Samples__c].uB_Office__c )='Americas', ([Samples__c].uB_Office__c )='Japan', ([Samples__c].uB_Office__c )='Taiwan') )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_21
formulas.expression:
AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Product_Family__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c})
), OR( ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'Confirmed') , ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'Partially shipped') ), {!myVariable_current.Product_Family__c} = 'Blueprint', OR( ({!myVariable_current.uB_Office__c} )='Americas', ({!myVariable_current.uB_Office__c} )='Japan', ({!myVariable_current.uB_Office__c} )='Taiwan') )

value.stringValue:
AND(
OR( ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].Request_Status__c, 'Partially delivered'), ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].Request_Status__c, 'Confirmed') ), [Samples__c].uB_Office__c = 'Americas', [Samples__c].RecordType.Name ='Sample request', BEGINS([Samples__c].Type_No__c, 'C16-C20'),
OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Request_Status__c), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].RecordType.Name), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Type_No__c), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].uB_Office__c)
) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_25
formulas.expression:
AND(
OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'Partially delivered'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'Confirmed') ), {!myVariable_current.uB_Office__c} = 'Americas', {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} ='Sample request', BEGINS({!myVariable_current.Type_No__c}, 'C16-C20'),
OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Type_No__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.uB_Office__c})
) )

), ISPICKVAL( [Samples__c].Request_Status__c, 'New') , NOT(ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].Sample_Usage__c, 'Samples in production (IP, MP)')), [Samples__c].RecordType.Name = 'Sample request', [Samples__c].Product_Family__c = 'Blueprint', [Samples__c].Product_Center__c = 'Short Range' )

), ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'New') , NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Sample_Usage__c}, 'Samples in production (IP, MP)')), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = 'Sample request', {!myVariable_current.Product_Family__c} = 'Blueprint', {!myVariable_current.Product_Center__c} = 'Short Range' )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_31
formula_myRule_33

value.stringValue:
AND( TEXT($User.uB_Office__c) = 'Americas', [Samples__c].RecordType.Name = 'Sample recording',
OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].RecordType.Name) ) )

AND( [Samples__c].RecordType.Name = "Sample recording", [Samples__c].Notify_Sales_Admin_Thalwil__c = true, ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Request_Status__c), ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].Request_Status__c, "Confirmed"), OR( ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].CreatedBy.uB_Office__c,"China"), ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].CreatedBy.uB_Office__c,"Hongkong"), ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].CreatedBy.uB_Office__c,"Korea"), ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].CreatedBy.uB_Office__c,"India"), ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].CreatedBy.uB_Office__c,"Australia"), ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].CreatedBy.uB_Office__c,"Rest of APAC") ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Sample recording", {!myVariable_current.Notify_Sales_Admin_Thalwil__c} = true, ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, "Confirmed"), OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.CreatedBy.uB_Office__c},"China"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.CreatedBy.uB_Office__c},"Hongkong"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.CreatedBy.uB_Office__c},"Korea"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.CreatedBy.uB_Office__c},"India"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.CreatedBy.uB_Office__c},"Australia"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.CreatedBy.uB_Office__c},"Rest of APAC") ) )

OR( ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].Request_Status__c, 'New'), ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].Request_Status__c, 'PM review pending') ), NOT(ISPICKVAL([Samples__c].Sample_Usage__c , 'Samples in production (IP, MP)')), [Samples__c].RecordType.Name ='Sample request', NOT([Samples__c].Product_Family__c = 'Blueprint'), [Samples__c].Product_Center__c = 'Cellular',
OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Sample_Usage__c), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Product_Family__c), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Product_Center__c), ISCHANGED([Samples__c].Request_Status__c)
) )

OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'New'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Request_Status__c}, 'PM review pending') ), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Sample_Usage__c} , 'Samples in production (IP, MP)')), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} ='Sample request', NOT({!myVariable_current.Product_Family__c} = 'Blueprint'), {!myVariable_current.Product_Center__c} = 'Cellular',

) )

Flow.label: Sample: Email alerts and update record

value.stringValue: The created record is for one of the embargo countries. Please check the Export Control Guideline provided by Legal (see https://wiki.u-blox.com/bin/view/Generic/LegalHome ).
